entry.title: Where did you go?
entry.summary:
Author: yellowingleaf

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,102Chapters: 13/15Kudos: 291

Summary: The kidnapper watches the small screen next to the TV with an increasingly incredulous expression as the larger man slowly starts to scootch the chair he is tied to, inch by inch, to get closer to their second captive, unconscious in his own chair.His hand keeps moving from the bowl of popcorn to his mouth mechanically while he continues to watch the men, more interested in what is happening on the smaller screen than in the movie scene that is happening on the larger one.When the brown haired man starts to move his head, while the blond one obviously tries to get his attention, the kidnapper decides this has gone on long enough and rises from the scraggly couch, tucking his gun inside his waistband as he exits his room on his way to the prisoners.ORBuck gets kidnapped, Eddie ... comes to the rescue?

entry.title: Til the words come back
entry.summary:
Author: Vike02002

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 73,692Chapters: 16/?Kudos: 29

Summary: AU :Eddie is in the military, operating on ground in Afghanistan. He walks past the bullets, the dead, and dust. One day, he starts reading a book one of his comrades gave him, without any expectation of it being good.He becomes obsessed with the reading, which gives him a little time to fly away from war, and decides to send a letter to the adress written at the end of the book.At the same time, on the other side of the ocean, in Los Angeles, Buck struggles to finish writing his last book, and has to deal with a fan obsessed with him at the point where he finds himself in danger.At some point, their both worlds will colapse, and create maybe the best story ever written.

entry.summary:
Author: Lalagirl92

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,189Chapters: 8/12Kudos: 223

Summary: When Buck feels increasingly isolated and unappreciated by the 118, he begins to pull away, believing they've already given up on him. During a dangerous rescue, tragedy strikes â€” Buck is swept away and presumed dead. His apparent loss shatters the team, forcing them to confront the guilt, regrets, and emotional distance they had let grow between them.But Buck survives â€” alive, injured, and with no memory of who he is.As the 118 grieves and struggles to move forward, fate brings them back to Buck. Rebuilding trust isnâ€™t easy, especially when Buck doesnâ€™t remember the pain â€” or the love â€” that once bound them. Now, they must earn their second chanceâ€¦ before itâ€™s too late.

The station celebrates his survival, calls him a hero, but all Buck can feel is the ghost of the man he used to be. Recovery is slow, and the mirror is merciless. He canâ€™t work, canâ€™t hold Maddieâ€™s baby without shaking, and worse â€” Eddie stops looking at him the same way.He was always the one who ran into flames without hesitation. entry.title: Little Do You Know
entry.summary:
Author: salenora

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 42,576Chapters: 20/?Kudos: 403

Summary: Post Lawsuit.Buck returns to the 118 and is basically invisible to the 118 for months. He plans to end his life but when Sam and Dean Winchester show up saying they have a lead in his husbands death, he puts his suicidal thoughts on hold, and takes off with the Winchesters to get revenge on the thing that killed his husband 5 years ago.But what happens when he forgot that he left a pre suicide scene at his apartment in the rush to leave? What happens when the 118 donâ€™t know about his past life and have no idea whatâ€™s going on?
